thread.title: BRIEF-Eversource Energy Says Site Evaluation Committee Denied Northern Pass's Siting Application​

title: BRIEF-Eversource Energy Says Site Evaluation Committee Denied Northern Pass's Siting Application​

organizations.name: brief-eversource energy says site evaluation committee denied northern pass
mittee denied northern pass's siting application​ reuters staff

text:
February 2, 2018 / 3:42 PM / Updated 16 minutes ago BRIEF-Eversource Energy Says Site Evaluation Committee Denied Northern Pass's Siting Application​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 2 (Reuters) - Eversource Energy: 
* SAYS ‍ON FEBRUARY 1, 2018, NEW HAMPSHIRE SITE EVALUATION COMMITTEE VOTED TO DENY NORTHERN PASS’ SITING APPLICATION​ 
* SAYS INTENDS TO SEEK RECONSIDERATION OF SITE EVALUATION COMMITTEE​'S DECISION & TO REVIEW ALL OPTIONS FOR MOVING PROJECT FORWARD - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2DUT97K ) Further company coverage:
